data.title: This American Life
data.meta_description: A weekly public radio program and podcast. Each week we choose a theme and put together different kinds of stories on that theme.
data.text:
Swim Towards the Shark

In a crisis, when all logic suggests that you get away from the dangerous thing, how will you respond?

View episode details

Recently Aired

View archive

Greetings, People Of Earth

Humans encounter non-human intelligences of various kinds and try to make sense of them.

24 Hours at the Golden Apple

One day in a Chicago diner.

The Big Rethink

People rethinking some of the most important relationships in their lives.

Recommended

Okay. It’s hundreds of episodes. Thousands of stories. We help you dig through the archive.View all

New to This American Life?

“When I’m trying to explain our program to someone who doesn’t know it, I stammer a bunch of words like ‘entertaining,’ ‘funny,’ ‘surprising plot twists,’ ‘true stories but not boring I swear’ … and then I just give them this list.” — Ira Glass
